meta.notes: Stable source of truth for writing, tone, accessibility, and consistency rules. This file should change rarely.

styleRules: Use clear prices and times when available.

formatting.ctaLabelGuidance: Use short action labels like 'View Class Schedule' or 'Request Rental Info'.

rules: Phone, email, and address must only come from globals.contact.
Calendar links should come from the calendar section content.
If a value is TBD_PENDING_CONFIRMATION, do not invent it in page content.
If images are used, include alt text.
Calendar sections should include readable schedule text in addition to embeds when possible.
Buttons and links should be clear and descriptive.
